name: Mahjong Fight Club Wii: Wi-Fi Taiou
summary:
Mahjong Kakutou Club Wii: Wi-Fi Taiou, the latest version of the “Mahjong Fighting Club” series is finally available on Wii! Support Nintendo Wi-Fi connection and enjoy online matches with Wii users nationwide for free! Japan Professional Mahjong Federation official recognition a total of 52 professional sparrow CPUs play! Full of other functions!

If you are connected to the network, you can play “National Battles” where you compete with players from all over the country for free! The deep game system, rich ranking function, and functions such as “Meetings” full of benefits are intertwined organically, creating a “weight of one stroke”! The real attraction of “Mahjong Fighting Club” is national competition!

Supports DS download play! If there is one this work, you can enjoy playing with Wii (1 person) and Nintendo DS (up to 3 people). The nationwide battle that many rivals await is even more heated!
